name: @danielkalen/exit-intent
description: The source code for Exit Intent.com

scripts.postversion: echo \'$(json -f package.json version)\' > .version.coffee && npm run build
scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:sass
scripts.compile:js: foreach -g 'src/coffee/*.coffee' -x 'simplyimport -i #{path} | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/#{name}.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/js/#{name}.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false -o dist/js/#{name}.js'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:sass
scripts.watch:js: simplywatch -g 'src/coffee/*' -x 'simplyimport -i #{path} | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/#{name}.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/js/#{name}.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false > dist/js/#{name}.js'

author: Daniel Kalen
